backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining products, orders, inquiries, user profiles, and access-controlled admin/user operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old actor state to the new actor format while dropping deprecated admin fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a specific admin access-denied copy update and the files affected.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH theme variables and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React application with the site title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React setup configuring routes, providers, and global layout for the application.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart state with localStorage persistence and item operations.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions and utility functions for cart items, totals, and conversion to backend order items.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing loading, login, error, or authorized content states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Displays a dialog showing detailed order information including customer data, items, totals, and timestamps.
Fetches and displays all orders in a table with loading, error, unauthorized, and empty states plus a details dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductImp: UI for uploading and parsing product import files, displaying parse errors, and sending valid products to the backend.
frontend/src/components/app/AppInquiryPa: Inquiry form that submits user messages and shows success or error status.
frontend/src/components/app/AppProductLi: Displays products from backend or sample data, handles loading and errors, and allows adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/components/app/AppShell.tsx: Mobile app shell with top bar, bottom navigation, and section switching.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthControl: Authentication control handling Internet Identity login/logout and principal copying.
frontend/src/components/catalog/SampleCa: Alert banner indicating sample products are shown and linking to admin import page.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders a multi-column site footer with branding, navigation links, services, contact details, and a dynamic year and referral link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive header with logo, navigation, cart indicator, admin link, auth controls, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/content/sampleContent.ts: Provides sample store info, sample products, and sample services used as fallback content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Updates the document title on mount and restores the previous title on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching products, orders, admin status, and performing mutations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with themes, utilities, and custom styles for components and admin UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company story, values, and branding, setting the page title.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for managing orders and importing products, protected by an admin guard.
frontend/src/pages/AppPage.tsx: Main app page managing catalog and inquiry sections within the AppShell layout.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items, allows quantity updates and item removal, shows totals, and handles navigation to checkout or products.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Validates customer info, places orders using cart data, redirects on empty cart, and clears cart after successful submission.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows store contact info and a form that submits customer inquiries and displays a temporary success message.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders homepage hero, features, and product previews using backend or sample data.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPlacedPage.tsx: Shows order confirmation with order ID and navigation options after successful checkout.
frontend/src/pages/ProductQuantityPage.t: Loads a product, lets users select quantity, add to cart or buy now, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product listing page with search, category/brand filters, backend-or-sample data fallback, and quick add-to-cart handling.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of predefined service offerings with icons and a section explaining service benefits.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats bigint prices into INR currency strings using en-IN locale.
frontend/src/utils/parseProductImportFil: Parses CSV/XLSX product import files, mapping columns, extracting rows, and collecting validation errors.
frontend/src/utils/principalFormat.ts: Safely extracts principal IDs and provides truncation for display.
frontend/src/utils/safeParse.ts: Provides safe parsing helpers for BigInt, positive integers, and quantity validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing admin-access issues, existing features, and pending requirements.
